definition: that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing

sentences.english: Quartz Mountain Residence, Paradise Valley, Arizona.
sentences.chinese: 亚力桑那州，天堂谷，石英山居。

sentences.english: That’s according the International Institute for Species Exploration at Arizona State University. [http://species.asu.edu/Top10]
sentences.chinese: 亚利桑那州立大学物种探索研究所就是这么表示的。

sentences.english: The University of Arizona now has the rights to reexamine the structure’s potential.
sentences.chinese: 亚利桑那大学现在重新验证整个结构的潜力。

sentences.english: If the drought continues, water deliveries to Arizona could potentially be cut back.
sentences.chinese: 如果干旱持续，运送到亚利桑那州的水可能会削减。

sentences.english: There are many coyotes in Arizona.
sentences.chinese: 在亚利桑那有许多郊狼。

sentences.english: Hunt camels in the state of Arizona.
sentences.chinese: 亚利桑那州禁止猎杀骆驼。

sentences.english: The Petrified Forest National Park is located in Arizona of U.S.A.
sentences.chinese: 石化森林国家公园位于美国亚利桑那州。

sentences.english: She grew up on Navajo reservations in Arizona, the daughter of two teachers.
sentences.chinese: 她生长于亚利桑那州纳瓦霍保留区，父母是教师。

sentences.english: She was one of the victims of a shooting last Saturday in Tucson, Arizona.
sentences.chinese: 她是上周六亚利桑那州图桑市枪击案的受害者之一。

sentences.english: BNG is located in sunny Arizona.
sentences.chinese: BNG坐落在阳光明媚的亚利桑那州。

sentences.english: I am in Arizona MST 3 hrs behind east coast time.
sentences.chinese: 我在亚利桑那州东海岸的MST时间落后3小时。

sentences.english: In Arizona, I have had plenty of distraction from the running.
sentences.chinese: 在亚利桑那，有很多事情能让我从跑步中分散注意力。

sentences.english: He and his wife, Sande, live in Tucson , Arizona. They have five children.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的妻子，住在亚利桑那州的图森，有五个孩子。

sentences.english: For example, Arizona does not observe it at all.
sentences.chinese: 比如说，亚利桑那州根本就不遵守。

sentences.english: Arizona timber tree with bluish silvery foliage.
sentences.chinese: 亚利桑那木材，叶带蓝色，有。

sentences.english: Now I see some cactuses out in Arizona.
sentences.chinese: 现在我看到了亚利桑那的仙人掌。

definition: (phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
Wuri, a district of Taichung, Taiwan
to eat/(extended meaning) to endure/putrid smell/vegetables/roots (inextricably attached to the plant)
used in the transliteration of people's names
